body:
If this email address is wrong, you can [change it here](/how-quickly/your-details).

## What happens next

The court or tribunal will look at your application.

If they approve it, they’ll send it to the transcription company.

The transcription company will contact you to:

- give you a cost estimate
- arrange payment
- send you the transcript

If you order transcripts regularly, the company may do the work without giving you an estimate.

[Apply for a transcript for another hearing]().
heading: Application complete
lede: We’ll send a confirmation email to [email@address.com].
